document.full_text: france and britain will deploy attack helicopters in libya, french officials said on monday, a step aimed at better targeting muammar gaddafi's forces which could help rebels break the stalemate.
document.title: france and britain to use attack helicopters in libya
lines_and_colors: france and britain will deploy attack helicopters in libya, french officials said on monday, a step aimed at better targeting muammar gaddafi's forces which could help rebels break the stalemate.
